entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:11 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 6:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: ESE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then east 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
